roleset.name: act in responce to a stimulus
roleset.note: Based on Arabic sentences. Comparison with react.01 and counteract.01. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: The counter-reaction of Libyan pressure on some areas of the Arab world.
example.arg: of Libyan pressure on some areas of the Arab world.

example.name: arg 2 - likely rare
example.text: Boredom during the week and the counter-reaction of too much action over the weekends.
example.arg: of too much action over the weekends.
